com.zachklipp.jfavicon

Class FaviconLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zachklipp.jfavicon.FaviconLoader

  • public class FaviconLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load favicons for a Source. If the source's HTML is not specified, it will be loaded. If the html contains favicon links, the domain favicons will be omitted. Can be configured to run network operations on a different thread by passing in different Executors.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FaviconLoader.FaviconCallback
      Passed the results of getFavicons.
